body_html:
As it is now these functions are not really eager-compatible. When you set a shared_name they work by accident.

We should add a class-based version of them like we have been doing for other packages (like feature_column).
body_text:
As it is now these functions are not really eager-compatible. When you set a shared_name they work by accident.
We should add a class-based version of them like we have been doing for other packages (like feature_column).
body:
As it is now these functions are not really eager-compatible. When you set a shared_name they work by accident.

We should add a class-based version of them like we have been doing for other packages (like feature_column).
